mapper.select: SELECT p.description 'title', di.place_name 'address', fi.file_name 'img_file_name', p.content 'content' FROM category cate JOIN product p on cate.id = p.category_id JOIN product_image pi on p.id = pi.product_id JOIN file_info fi on pi.file_id = fi.id JOIN display_info di on p.id = di.product_id WHERE pi.type = 'th'

SELECT p.description 'title', di.place_name 'address', fi.file_name 'img_file_name', p.content 'content' FROM category cate JOIN product p on cate.id = p.category_id JOIN product_image pi on p.id = pi.product_id JOIN file_info fi on pi.file_id = fi.id JOIN display_info di on p.id = di.product_id WHERE pi.type = 'th' AND cate.id = #{id}
